summary:
GrokChain: Embracing the AI Revolution in Blockchain - GrokChain is a layer 1 blockchain project that integrates artificial intelligence (AI) to redefine the blockchain landscape. It focuses on scalability, smart contracts, interoperability, and community governance.

 GrokChain Tokenomics - GrokChain's token, GROC, has a total supply of 1 billion and a buy and sell tax of 2%.
